llama_layers.description: The number of layers in the LLM

llm_dim.description: The number of features in the LLM

n_heads.description: The number of heads in the LLM

d_llm.description: The number of features in the LLM

seq_len.description: The length of the input sequence

label_len.description: The length of the label sequence

pred_len.description: The length of the prediction sequence

dec_in.description: The number of decoder input features

d_ff.description: The number of features in the feedforward network

d_model.description: The number of features in the model

batch_size.description: The number of samples in a batch

learning_rate.description: The learning rate of the model

train_epochs.description: The number of epochs to train the model

dropout.description: The dropout rate of the model

features.description: The type of features used in the model

task.description: The Electricity Transformer Temperature (ETT) is a crucial indicator in the electric power long-term deployment.
